H0.text: where are the 10 plagues found in the bible. Leviticus

H1.text: where are the 10 plagues found in the bible. Numbers

H2.text: where are the 10 plagues found in the bible. Deuteronomy

H3.text: where are the 10 plagues found in the bible. Exodus

A4.text: In the Book of Exodus, the Plagues of Egypt (Hebrew: מכות מצרים‎) were ten disasters that Yahweh inflicted on the Egyptians to convince the Pharaoh to emancipate the enslaved Israelites, each of them confronting the Pharaoh and one of his Egyptian gods; they served as 'signs and marvels' given by Yahweh in response to the Pharaoh's taunt that he does not know Yahweh: 'The Egyptians shall know that I am the LORD'.

A5.text: Graham Davies, however, questions Van Seters' interpretation and argues that several verses in the book (e.g. Deuteronomy 6:22; 11:2–3) seem to clearly allude to a plague tradition.

A6.text: God curses the Egyptians with ten terrible plagues, such as a river of blood, an outbreak of frogs, and the thick darkness.
